meanings.definition: Inhabitant or resident of a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The denizens of the forest scurried about, gathering food for the winter.
meanings.sent2: The city denizens enjoyed the annual street festival.
meanings.sent3: The denizens of the zoo put on a talent show for the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The denizens of the deep sea remain a mystery to many scientists.
meanings.sent5: The denizens of the old castle were said to be friendly ghosts.

meanings.definition: A person, animal, or plant that is native to a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The denizens of the desert have adapted to the harsh climate over generations.
meanings.sent2: The denizens of the rainforest display a wide variety of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent3: The denizens of the garden threw a surprise party for the gardener.
meanings.sent4: The denizens of the mountain are resilient in the face of extreme weather.
meanings.sent5: The denizens of the island welcomed the new arrivals with open arms.
